NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​SavedConfigurationData
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​SavedConfigurationData

Configuration data for this software and NetSparkle instance.  Allows you to get information on the versions that the user skipped, when the last update was performed, etc.  Used by the JSONConfiguration class to save/load data easily to/from disk.

Properties
CheckForUpdate
public bool CheckForUpdate { get; set }

Whether or not to check for an update

LastCheckTime
public DateTime LastCheckTime { get; set }

The last DateTime that an update check was performed

PreviousVersionOfSoftwareRan
public string PreviousVersionOfSoftwareRan { get; set }

The previous version of the software that the user ran

LastVersionSkipped
public string LastVersionSkipped { get; set }

The last version (as a string) that the user chose to skip.  Can be blank.

DidRunOnce
public bool DidRunOnce { get; set }

Whether or not the software has run at least one time.

LastConfigUpdate
public DateTime LastConfigUpdate { get; set }

Last DateTime that the configuration data was updated.
